      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.hdfs that return DFSPacket 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private DFSPacket DFSOutputStream.createHeartbeatPacket()
      For heartbeat packets, create buffer directly by new byte[] since heartbeats should not be blocked.
      private DFSPacket DFSOutputStream.createPacket(int packetSize, int chunksPerPkt, long offsetInBlock, long seqno, boolean lastPacketInBlock)
      Use ByteArrayManager to create buffer for non-heartbeat packets.
